content.text:
{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":237912,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人にも、魔物にも、魔人にも、魔王にも、","translatedEnglishLine":"Neither a human, nor a monster, nor a demon, nor a demon lord,"},{"lineNumber":237913,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なにものにもなることはできない」","translatedEnglishLine":"can one become anything else."},{"lineNumber":237914,"originalJapaneseLine":"「神として作られた以上、","translatedEnglishLine":"Since you were created as a god,"},{"lineNumber":237915,"originalJapaneseLine":"　永遠に神として生き続ける」","translatedEnglishLine":"you will continue to live forever as a god."},{"lineNumber":237916,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そう『作られて』いるのです」","translatedEnglishLine":"That is how you are 'made'."},{"lineNumber":237917,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほっほっ、どうやらご存じなかったようだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Hoho, it seems you were not aware of this.'"},

{"lineNumber":237918,"originalJapaneseLine":"「たとえばこんなものが」","translatedEnglishLine":"'For example, something like this.'"},

{"lineNumber":237919,"originalJapaneseLine":"ネプラカスは、胸元からある薬品を取り出した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Neprakass took out a certain potion from his chest."},

{"lineNumber":237920,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これは神が人間に転じる薬でございます」","translatedEnglishLine":"'This is a potion that turns a god into a human.'"},

{"lineNumber":237921,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Eh...?'"},
  
{"lineNumber":237922,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほほっ、世の中にはえてして、","translatedEnglishLine":"'Hoho, in this world, there are often,"},

{"lineNumber":237923,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんな珍品がそこらに","translatedEnglishLine":"rare items like this lying around here and there,"},

{"lineNumber":237924,"originalJapaneseLine":"　転がっているものでございます」","translatedEnglishLine":"you know.'"},

{"lineNumber":237925,"originalJapaneseLine":"「たった……","translatedEnglishLine":"'Just...'"},

{"lineNumber":237926,"originalJapaneseLine":"　たったそれだけで人間に？」","translatedEnglishLine":"'with just that, you become a human?'"},

{"lineNumber":237927,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私も、人間になれるというのですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Are you saying I can become human as well?'"},

{"lineNumber":237928,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人間になって……","translatedEnglishLine":"'Become human...'"},

{"lineNumber":237929,"originalJapaneseLine":"　地上に出ることが出来ると？」","translatedEnglishLine":"and be able to go out onto the surface?'"},

{"lineNumber":237930,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":".........."},

{"lineNumber":237931,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もちろんでございます」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Of course.'"},

{"lineNumber":237932,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、いえ、ですが――」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Ah, no, but—'"},

{"lineNumber":237933,"originalJapaneseLine":"流れるような動きでネプラカスは","translatedEnglishLine":"With flowing movement, Neprakass"},

{"lineNumber":237934,"originalJapaneseLine":"薬を胸元にまた仕舞い込んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"put the potion back into his chest."},

{"lineNumber":237935,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やはり、こんなものに","translatedEnglishLine":"'After all, something like this'"},

{"lineNumber":237936,"originalJapaneseLine":"　手を伸ばすべきではありませんなぁ」","translatedEnglishLine":"should not be something you reach for.'"},

{"lineNumber":237937,"originalJapaneseLine":"「神異変はわたくしも存じ上げておりますが……","translatedEnglishLine":"'I am also aware of the divine upheaval...'"},

{"lineNumber":237938,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あれが永遠に続くとは限りますまい」","translatedEnglishLine":"'But it does not necessarily last forever.'"},

{"lineNumber":237939,"originalJapaneseLine":"「たった一時の情熱の為に、愛の為に、","translatedEnglishLine":"'For just a moment of passion, for love,'"},

{"lineNumber":237940,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今のご自分の立場を全て捨てて、","translatedEnglishLine":"to throw away your entire current position,"},

{"lineNumber":237941,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ただの人間の身を落とす？」","translatedEnglishLine":"and degrade yourself to the body of a mere human?'"},

{"lineNumber":237942,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかも一級神でおられるクエルプラン様が？","translatedEnglishLine":"'And you, Lord Quelplan, a first-class god?'"},

{"lineNumber":237943,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ほっ、馬鹿げておりますなぁ」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Hoh, it is ridiculous indeed.'"},

{"lineNumber":237944,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そもそも人間になったところで、","translatedEnglishLine":"'Even if you become human to begin with,"},

{"lineNumber":237945,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あなた様の恋が上手くいく保証など、","translatedEnglishLine":"there is no guarantee that your love will succeed,"},

{"lineNumber":237946,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まったくございませんでしょう？」","translatedEnglishLine":"is there?'"},

{"lineNumber":237947,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人間になって得られる物……","translatedEnglishLine":"'What you gain by becoming human...'"},

{"lineNumber":237948,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それがなんだか分かりますかな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"do you understand what that is?"},

{"lineNumber":237949,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人に恋をする権利です」","translatedEnglishLine":"'It is the right to fall in love with someone.'"},

{"lineNumber":237950,"originalJapaneseLine":"「たったそれだけの為に全てをお捨てになると？","translatedEnglishLine":"'To give up everything for just that?'"},

{"lineNumber":237951,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ほほっ、ねえ？　馬鹿げておりますでしょう？」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Hoho, right? Isn't it foolish?'"},

{"lineNumber":237952,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わた、し……」","translatedEnglishLine":"'I...'"},

{"lineNumber":237953,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私、は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"'I...'"},

{"lineNumber":237954,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………私は」","translatedEnglishLine":"'...I...'"},

{"lineNumber":237955,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ……もちろん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Well... of course...'"},

{"lineNumber":237956,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうなさるかは神様の言う通り、","translatedEnglishLine":"'What you decide to do is, after all, what the god says,"},

{"lineNumber":237957,"originalJapaneseLine":"　でございますがねぇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"after all.'"},

{"lineNumber":237958,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほっほっほっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Hohoho!'"},

{"lineNumber":237959,"originalJapaneseLine":"ネプラカスは、顔の皺を更に深くして、","translatedEnglishLine":"Neprakass deepened the wrinkles on his face even more,"},

{"lineNumber":237960,"originalJapaneseLine":"にっこりと笑っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and smiled broadly."},

{"lineNumber":237961,"originalJapaneseLine":"悪魔が笑っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon was laughing."},

{"lineNumber":237962,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":".........."},

{"lineNumber":237963,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"...."},

{"lineNumber":237964,"originalJapaneseLine":"これは――","translatedEnglishLine":"This is—"},

{"lineNumber":237965,"originalJapaneseLine":"ある神の悲恋の物語。","translatedEnglishLine":"The tragic love story of a certain god."},

{"lineNumber":237966,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},

{"lineNumber":237967,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜ちゅんちゅん、ちゅん＞","translatedEnglishLine":"<Chun chun, chun> (bird chirping)"},

{"lineNumber":237968,"originalJapaneseLine":"鳥の鳴き声が聞こえる。","translatedEnglishLine":"The sound of birds chirping is heard."},

{"lineNumber":237969,"originalJapaneseLine":"何か夢を見ていた気がするが、","translatedEnglishLine":"I feel like I was dreaming of something,"},

{"lineNumber":237970,"originalJapaneseLine":"思い出せない。","translatedEnglishLine":"but I can't remember it."},

{"lineNumber":237971,"originalJapaneseLine":"思い出せないが、大したことでないだろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"I can't remember, but it probably wasn't anything important."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人にも、魔物にも、魔人にも、魔王にも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Neither a human, nor a monster, nor a demon, nor a demon lord,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにものにもなることはできない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: can one become anything else.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「神として作られた以上、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since you were created as a god,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 永遠に神として生き続ける」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you will continue to live forever as a god.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう『作られて』いるのです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is how you are 'made'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほっほっ、どうやらご存じなかったようだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Hoho, it seems you were not aware of this.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たとえばこんなものが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'For example, something like this.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネプラカスは、胸元からある薬品を取り出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Neprakass took out a certain potion from his chest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これは神が人間に転じる薬でございます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'This is a potion that turns a god into a human.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほほっ、世の中にはえてして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Hoho, in this world, there are often,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな珍品がそこらに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: rare items like this lying around here and there,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 転がっているものでございます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you know.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たった……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Just...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たったそれだけで人間に？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'with just that, you become a human?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私も、人間になれるというのですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Are you saying I can become human as well?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間になって……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Become human...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地上に出ることが出来ると？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and be able to go out onto the surface?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もちろんでございます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Of course.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、いえ、ですが――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Ah, no, but—'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 流れるような動きでネプラカスは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With flowing movement, Neprakass

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 薬を胸元にまた仕舞い込んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: put the potion back into his chest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やはり、こんなものに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'After all, something like this'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手を伸ばすべきではありませんなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: should not be something you reach for.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「神異変はわたくしも存じ上げておりますが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'I am also aware of the divine upheaval...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれが永遠に続くとは限りますまい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'But it does not necessarily last forever.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たった一時の情熱の為に、愛の為に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'For just a moment of passion, for love,'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今のご自分の立場を全て捨てて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to throw away your entire current position,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただの人間の身を落とす？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and degrade yourself to the body of a mere human?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかも一級神でおられるクエルプラン様が？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'And you, Lord Quelplan, a first-class god?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほっ、馬鹿げておりますなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Hoh, it is ridiculous indeed.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そもそも人間になったところで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Even if you become human to begin with,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなた様の恋が上手くいく保証など、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there is no guarantee that your love will succeed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まったくございませんでしょう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is there?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間になって得られる物……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'What you gain by becoming human...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それがなんだか分かりますかな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: do you understand what that is?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人に恋をする権利です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'It is the right to fall in love with someone.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たったそれだけの為に全てをお捨てになると？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'To give up everything for just that?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほほっ、ねえ？　馬鹿げておりますでしょう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Hoho, right? Isn't it foolish?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ……もちろん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Well... of course...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうなさるかは神様の言う通り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'What you decide to do is, after all, what the god says,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でございますがねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: after all.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほっほっほっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Hohoho!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネプラカスは、顔の皺を更に深くして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Neprakass deepened the wrinkles on his face even more,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: にっこりと笑っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and smiled broadly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪魔が笑っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon was laughing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ある神の悲恋の物語。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The tragic love story of a certain god.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ちゅんちゅん、ちゅん＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Chun chun, chun> (bird chirping)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鳥の鳴き声が聞こえる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sound of birds chirping is heard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か夢を見ていた気がするが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I feel like I was dreaming of something,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思い出せない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I can't remember it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思い出せないが、大したことでないだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't remember, but it probably wasn't anything important.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

{"lineNumber":237924,"originalJapaneseLine":"　転がっているものでございます」","translatedEnglishLine":"you know.'"},

{"lineNumber":237925,"originalJapaneseLine":"「たった……","translatedEnglishLine":"'Just...'"},

{"lineNumber":237926,"originalJapaneseLine":"　たったそれだけで人間に？」","translatedEnglishLine":"'with just that, you become a human?'"},

{"lineNumber":237929,"originalJapaneseLine":"　地上に出ることが出来ると？」","translatedEnglishLine":"and be able to go out onto the surface?'"},

{"lineNumber":237936,"originalJapaneseLine":"　手を伸ばすべきではありませんなぁ」","translatedEnglishLine":"should not be something you reach for.'"},

{"lineNumber":237937,"originalJapaneseLine":"「神異変はわたくしも存じ上げておりますが……","translatedEnglishLine":"'I am also aware of the divine upheaval...'"},

{"lineNumber":237938,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あれが永遠に続くとは限りますまい」","translatedEnglishLine":"'But it does not necessarily last forever.'"},

{"lineNumber":237939,"originalJapaneseLine":"「たった一時の情熱の為に、愛の為に、","translatedEnglishLine":"'For just a moment of passion, for love,'"},

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人にも、魔物にも、魔人にも、魔王にも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Neither a human, nor a monster, nor a demon, nor a demon lord,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにものにもなることはできない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: can one become anything else.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「神として作られた以上、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since you were created as a god,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 永遠に神として生き続ける」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you will continue to live forever as a god.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう『作られて』いるのです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is how you are 'made'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほっほっ、どうやらご存じなかったようだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Hoho, it seems you were not aware of this.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たとえばこんなものが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'For example, something like this.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネプラカスは、胸元からある薬品を取り出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Neprakass took out a certain potion from his chest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これは神が人間に転じる薬でございます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'This is a potion that turns a god into a human.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほほっ、世の中にはえてして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Hoho, in this world, there are often,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな珍品がそこらに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: rare items like this lying around here and there,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 転がっているものでございます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you know.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たった……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Just...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たったそれだけで人間に？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'with just that, you become a human?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私も、人間になれるというのですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Are you saying I can become human as well?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間になって……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Become human...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地上に出ることが出来ると？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and be able to go out onto the surface?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もちろんでございます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Of course.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、いえ、ですが――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Ah, no, but—'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 流れるような動きでネプラカスは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With flowing movement, Neprakass

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 薬を胸元にまた仕舞い込んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: put the potion back into his chest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やはり、こんなものに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'After all, something like this'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手を伸ばすべきではありませんなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: should not be something you reach for.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「神異変はわたくしも存じ上げておりますが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'I am also aware of the divine upheaval...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれが永遠に続くとは限りますまい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'But it does not necessarily last forever.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たった一時の情熱の為に、愛の為に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'For just a moment of passion, for love,'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今のご自分の立場を全て捨てて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to throw away your entire current position,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただの人間の身を落とす？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and degrade yourself to the body of a mere human?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかも一級神でおられるクエルプラン様が？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'And you, Lord Quelplan, a first-class god?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほっ、馬鹿げておりますなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Hoh, it is ridiculous indeed.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そもそも人間になったところで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Even if you become human to begin with,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなた様の恋が上手くいく保証など、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there is no guarantee that your love will succeed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まったくございませんでしょう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is there?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間になって得られる物……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'What you gain by becoming human...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それがなんだか分かりますかな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: do you understand what that is?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人に恋をする権利です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'It is the right to fall in love with someone.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たったそれだけの為に全てをお捨てになると？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'To give up everything for just that?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほほっ、ねえ？　馬鹿げておりますでしょう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Hoho, right? Isn't it foolish?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ……もちろん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Well... of course...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうなさるかは神様の言う通り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'What you decide to do is, after all, what the god says,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でございますがねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: after all.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほっほっほっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Hohoho!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネプラカスは、顔の皺を更に深くして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Neprakass deepened the wrinkles on his face even more,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: にっこりと笑っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and smiled broadly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪魔が笑っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon was laughing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ある神の悲恋の物語。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The tragic love story of a certain god.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ちゅんちゅん、ちゅん＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Chun chun, chun> (bird chirping)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鳥の鳴き声が聞こえる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sound of birds chirping is heard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か夢を見ていた気がするが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I feel like I was dreaming of something,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思い出せない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I can't remember it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思い出せないが、大したことでないだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't remember, but it probably wasn't anything important.
